meanings.definition: A V-shaped fortification used in military defense.
meanings.sent1: The soldiers hid behind the redans to protect themselves.
meanings.sent2: The castle had redans strategically placed along the walls.
meanings.sent3: The redans looked like giant triangles sticking out of the ground.
meanings.sent4: The redans stood like sharp teeth ready to defend the fortress.
meanings.sent5: The redans formed a formidable barrier against enemy attacks.

meanings.definition: A type of architectural feature resembling a projecting angle.
meanings.sent1: The building's redans added an interesting touch to its design.
meanings.sent2: The redans on the roof gave the house a unique look.
meanings.sent3: The redans made the building look like it had wings.
meanings.sent4: The redans jutted out like arms reaching for the sky.
meanings.sent5: The redans created a striking visual effect on the structure.
